module.uhc.half_health.description: Cuts the health of players by half
All leaves only drop apples in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.need_for_resources.desc:
All stones types drop cobblestone
Gravel drop arrows
Sand drop glass
Cactus drop planks
Dead bushes drop bread
Mushrooms drop stews
module.uhc.loots.animal_cooked_food.desc: Many animals drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.mob_cooked_food.descrip: Many mobs drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.blasted_ores.descriptio:
All ores get smelt, doubled and bring more experience
(Coal ores give torches)
module.uhc.timberman.description: Trees get cut instantly and drop oak planks
module.uhc.flash_mcqueen.description: Permanent haste III and a lot speed
text.uhc.bar.vulnerable_in: You will be vulnerable to damages in %s...
text.uhc.bar.shrink_finish_in: The world is shrinking! Finished in %s...
text.uhc.invulnerable_until_shrink_start: You will be invulnerable to damages until the world starts shrinking!
text.uhc.bar.shrink_start_in: The world will start shrinking in %s...
text.uhc.dropped_players: Players have been dropped on the map. Good luck!
text.uhc.invulnerability_end: You are no longer immune to damages!
text.uhc.shrinking_started: The world has started shrinking! Go to the center of the map!
